data.title: Toronto ON Pre construction & New Homes for Sale
data.meta_description: Livabl has 4770 new homes for sale in Toronto, ON. View pricing, photos, floor plans & maps. Discover your next new construction or pre-construction home.
data.text:
There are 1,116 new home communities in Toronto, a mix of high-rise and low-rise that are planned, under construction or recently completed. There are 1,018 condo communities in Toronto, with 4,399 floorplans and units for sale. There are 204 townhouse communities in Toronto, with 314 floorplans and units and 16 single-family home communities, with 57 floorplans and units for sale. The median price per square foot for a low-rise home is $1,096. There are 14 quick move-in homes in Toronto for sale. The most active developer in Toronto is Kingsett Capital.

Find your new construction home in Toronto by browsing the map, or using the filters above. Filter map search results by number of bedrooms or price. More filters are available on the map. Save your search to receive updates on Toronto new home inventory that meets your criteria.
